decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The works to which this consent relates, must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (0300_e001 Rev. a, 0300_e002 Rev. a, 0300_e003 Rev. a, 0300_e004 Rev. a. Received: 02/09/2015. 0300_p002 Rev. b, 0300_p003 Rev. b, 0300_p004 Rev. b. Received: 06/10/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - All new internal and external works, including works of making good, shall match the original work in both type, colour and dimensions of materials and in detailed execution.
Condition : 4 - The new eaves dormer hereby approved shall match exactly the details of the two existing front dormer windows in scale, design, details, proportion and materials
description: Refurbishment of existing garage and replacement of window (Listed Building Consent)
